articles.title: WPK Delegation Attends 7th Congress of Popular Liberation Movement of Angola
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Attends 7th Congress of Popular Liberation Movement of Angola
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The Seventh Congress of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola took place in Luanda between August 17 and 20.
					 A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) led by Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the WPK, attended the congress.
					
					 The platform was taken by President of the Republic of Angola Jose Eduardo Dos Santos, president of the Central Committee of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola, members of the leadership of the Movement, Ri Su Yong, head of the WPK delegation, and other heads of the party delegations of various countries.
					
					 A report on the work of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola and congratulatory speeches were made at the congress.
					
					 Ri Su Yong, head of the WPK delegation, made a congratulatory speech.
					
					 Warmly congratulating the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola on its Seventh Congress upon the authorization of the C.C., the WPK, he noted that the congress marked an important occasion in providing a new landmark in turning Angola into an independent and prosperous country.
					
					 He stressed that the WPK would make all efforts to further develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the WPK and the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola in the future, too, true to the will of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Jose Eduardo Dos Santos was re-elected as president of the Central Committee of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola at the congress.
					
					 During the congress Ri Su Yong met Jose Eduardo Dos Santos.
					
					 Jose Eduardo Dos Santos extended deep thanks to Kim Jong Un for sending the WPK delegation to the Seventh Congress of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola.
					
					 During the congress Ri Su Yong separately met and had talks with Nangolo Mbumba, general secretary of the South West Africa People's Organizational Party, Eliseu Joaquim Machava, secretary general of the Mozambique Liberation Front Party, the chairman of the Liberation Movement of Sao Tome and Principe-Social Democratic Party, Jose Ramon Balaguer, international secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, and other heads of the party delegations of various countries.

articles.title: CPRC Spokesman Slashes U.S.-S. Korea Projected Ulji Freedom Guardian
articles.content:
CPRC Spokesman Slashes U.S.-S. Korea Projected Ulji Freedom Guardian
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country (CPRC) of the DPRK issued a statement on Sunday as regards the large-scale Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drill to be staged by the U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers from August 22.
					 It goes without saying that this drill, too, is an outrageous provocation for a nuclear war against the north aimed to encroach upon the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK and infringe on the vital rights of its people, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the joint military drill is to be staged under the simulated conditions of a sudden attack on the DPRK. It is, therefore, the most undisguised physical measure and provocative action to chill the desire of all Koreans for reunification growing stronger thanks to the DPRK's step to hold a grand national meeting for improving the inter-Korean relations and bringing earlier reunification. This saber-rattling is also aimed at stemming the trend for independence against the U.S. getting ever more dynamic along with the actions against THAAD deployment in south Korea. 
					
					 The DPRK remains unchanged in its stand on the prevailing situation.
					
					 It is the resolute stand of the DPRK to decisively foil all hostile acts and threat of aggression and provocation with the Korean-style nuclear deterrence which has been bolstered by the service personnel and people of the DPRK with the might of single-minded unity and through the drive for breaking through the cutting edge true to the line of simultaneously pushing ahead the two fronts, something hard to find in any part of the world.
					
					 The only choice for the U.S. to save its face and preserve its existence is to stop such dangerous muscle flexing against the north such as Ulji Freedom Guardian and roll back its foolish and brigandish anti-DPRK hostile policy aimed to get something through sanctions and pressure.
					
					 Availing itself of this opportunity, the DPRK solemnly warns the Park Geun Hye group of traitors once again that it had better stop going reckless, properly understanding the daily growing politico-military might of the fellow countrymen in the north, its dramatically changed position and subsequently altered strategic structure on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group Accused of Floating Story of Letting North's Abductees Settle in S. Korea
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group Accused of Floating Story of Letting North's Abductees Settle in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of traitors in south Korea which had kept the women abductees of the DPRK in custody for over four months despite the strong denunciation and demand for their repatriation at home and abroad recently made public that they let those girls "be free and settle in society". 
					 Timed to coincide with this, the puppet authorities and the ultra-right conservative forces are blustering that "there is no ground left for the north to claim that the women employees are in custody."
					
					 The Emergency Measure Committee for Rescue of Forcible Abductees of the DPRK in a statement released on Sunday says:
					
					 This is another mean burlesque staged by the puppet group to cover up forever the truth behind the group abduction committed by it and divert the social censure for its detention of those employees and calm down the strong voices of the public at home and abroad demanding it let them meet with their families and their repatriation.
					
					 The puppet group prevents them from being opened to public and keeps them from contacting media. This proves that its statement is a sheer lie.
					
					 The puppet group does not let those women make public appearance to freely express their will. It is not because of their "personal safety" but because it is afraid of its unheard-of group abduction and unethical crimes from being brought to light.
					
					 Aware that with neither appeasement nor threat can it shake the determination and will of those girls to go back to the fold of the homeland, the group is seeking to keep them in custody in a solitary place and ruin them.
					
					 In the light of the barbarous and cruel nature of the Park group there could be some women who had been mercilessly murdered.
					
					 We will never pardon the group abduction and crimes against humanity committed by the Park group but will fight it out till those women are rescued and brought back to the fold of the DPRK.

articles.title: Delegation of Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Federation of Korean Young Nationals in China Here
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federation of Korean Young Nationals in China headed by Chairwoman Kim Yong Nyo arrived here on Sunday to participate in the Ninth Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.

articles.title: Young Korean Nationals in China Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Young Korean Nationals in China Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Sunday.
					 Members of the delegation laid bouquets before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Botanical Dictionary Published in DPRK
articles.content:
Botanical Dictionary Published in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The Botany Institute of the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK released a botanical dictionary (Vol. for spore-bearing plants).
					 The dictionary carries botanical names of over 52,000 spore-bearing plants in five languages, dividing them into moss tribe, fungus tribe, algae tribe, etc.
					
					 The publication of the dictionary will be conducive to making effective use of plant resources.

articles.title: Stockbreeding Base in Sepho Tableland
articles.content:
Stockbreeding Base in Sepho Tableland
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The construction of a big stockbreeding base in Sepho tableland, Kangwon Province of the DPRK is nearing its completion.
					 Dwelling houses, public buildings and sheds have been built in different parts of the tableland which is covered with cocksfoot, alfalfa, clover and other feed crops cultivated on the principle of the right crop on the right soil.
					
					 The Sepho tableland is a volcanogenic basaltic land formed tens of million years ago and known as a wasteland for rough weather conditions.
					
					 But the land has witnessed dramatic changes, thanks to the devoted efforts of the great leaders.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung took measures to build a sheep station in the tableland in 1946, one year after Korea's liberation from Japan's colonial rule.
					
					 In the period of the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953), he visited there to indicate the ways for improving peasants' livelihood, saying that livestock farming should be promoted in the area.
					
					 True to the noble intention of the President, leader Kim Jong Il set forth highly important tasks to turn the Sepho area into a socialist land of happiness in 1980s and sent dozens of highbred cattle to the area in 1992.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un saw to it that the first grand nature-remaking project for the new century of Juche was begun in the area.
					
					 According to his far-reaching plan to reclaim the Sepho tableland for large-scale stockbreeding, a new history of great change came to begin in the area.
					
					 After the start of the project, there appeared grassland covering thousands of hectares with a number of structures.

articles.title: Great Achievements Witnessed in Run-up to Congress of Youth
articles.content:
Great Achievements Witnessed in Run-up to Congress of Youth
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Great economic achievements have been made by young people of the DPRK in the run-up to the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					 After the start of the 200-day campaign, at least 3 000 young people volunteered themselves to work in difficult economic fields, including the construction site of the Ryomyong Street.
					
					 Young people in Pyongyang City completed six projects, which are of big significance in building an economic power and improving the people's standard of living. Now, they are waging a campaign to finish 12 projects.
					
					 Youth shock brigades of over 50 coal mines in South Phyongan Province have overfulfilled their monthly quotas.
					
					 Young people in North Phyongan Province have dedicated their all to updating industrial establishments like the December 15 Youth Mine.
					
					 Young people are also playing the vanguard role in remodeling the Wonsan Youth Hall of Kangwon Province and in boosting mineral output at the Musan Mining Complex of North Hamgyong Province.
					
					 Such successes have been heard from the field of railway transportation.

articles.title: Minju Joson Urges U.S. to Make Policy Switchover
articles.content:
Minju Joson Urges U.S. to Make Policy Switchover
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- U.S. political camp is locked in a fierce bickering over the issue of future orientation of its foreign policy as the tenure of Obama's office is to expire before long.
					 Commenting on this Minju Joson Sunday says this is mainly attributable to the total bankruptcy the U.S. faces in its policy of confrontation by force, policy of domination.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 As soon as the Obama administration emerged, it adopted the policy of confrontation by force as its new foreign policy line while asserting "the demonstration of its leadership based on strength."
					
					 Pursuant to this line, the U.S. has intensified its military highhanded and arbitrary practices to round off in the main its strategy for dominating the Mideast and set about carrying out its Asia-Pacific rebalancing strategy.
					
					 Setting it as a main politico-military task to establish domination over the whole Korean peninsula in executing the above-said strategy, the U.S. focused its efforts on implementing its hostile policy for stifling the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK was compelled to opt for bolstering the capability for self-defence with nuclear force as its pivot as the U.S. is escalating the offensive to stifle the former, threatening its sovereignty and its vital rights.
					
					 As a result, the DPRK had access even to H-bomb, ranking itself among nuclear powers. It has military muscle strong enough to mount merciless attacks on the enemies wherever they are if it is determined to do so.
					
					 The U.S. has repeated setbacks in the issue of relations with the DPRK.
					
					 In a word, the Obama administration's foreign policy proved totally futile. This is the world opinion.
					
					 The U.S. had better opt for making a policy switchover, though belatedly, drawing a serious lesson from the policy errors made by the Obama administration, leaving an indelible blot on its history, warns the commentary.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Developing NAM under Banner of Independence against Imperialism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Developing NAM under Banner of Independence against Imperialism
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article calls for developing the non-aligned movement (NAM), a powerful independent force against imperialism in the present times.
					 It is the desire and will of mankind to live in a peaceful and prosperous world free from aggression, war, domination and subjugation, the article says, and goes on: 
					
					 The prevailing situation requires all countries and nations to turn out in the struggle for frustrating the imperialists' aggression and infringement upon their sovereignty and achieving global independence.
					
					 The NAM, a force for peace against war, has an important duty to perform in accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 The NAM is, in essence, the movement for making the whole world independent. The cause of global independence can make a triumphant advance only when the non-aligned countries further expand the NAM while holding their position and creditably discharging their role under the situation where there exist the imperialist forces keen on aggression and war in the world.
					
					 The article calls on the non-aligned countries to fight against the imperialists to the last for themselves, their future and global peace under the uplifted banner of independence against imperialism.
					
					 The DPRK will make every effort to develop the NAM by firmly joining hands with the non-aligned countries in the future, too, concludes the article.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Obama for Trumpeting about "Building of World without Nuclear Weapons"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Obama for Trumpeting about "Building of World without Nuclear Weapons"
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Obama's initiative for "building a world without nuclear weapons" is no more than a smokescreen for carrying out the U.S. strategy for nuclear monopoly and the one for dominating the world as it is aimed to turn the whole world into the "world where there exist its nukes only" and the "world dominated by its nukes," says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is chiefly to blame for disturbing the nuclear non-proliferation mechanism while applying the double standards as regards the nuclear issue.
					
					 The U.S., regarding nuclear weapons as means for realizing its ambition to dominate the world, has steadily developed and produced new type nuclear weapons and stepped up their modernization by spending a stupendous amount of funds at present.
					
					 It is the plan of the U.S. Department of Defense to modernize all its nuclear arsenals by spending about one trillion dollars in three decades to come. 
					
					 The Korean peninsula is exposed to the biggest danger of a nuclear war. 
					
					 Having put the DPRK on the list of preemptive nuclear strike, the U.S. nuclear war maniacs are now threatening to mount a preemptive nuclear attack upon it without any prior warning.
					
					 Without strong war deterrent, it is absolutely impossible to beat back the U.S. aggression and state-sponsored terrorism.
					
					 What happened in Iraq and Libya teaches a serious lesson that if those countries exposed to constant threat of preemptive nuclear strike of the U.S. fail to have powerful deterrent, they are bound to fall victim to its state-sponsored terrorism.
					
					 No matter how vociferously Obama touts his initiative "for building a world without nuclear weapons," this will only disclose the U.S. sinister hegemonic purpose.
					
					 The U.S. should not pay lip service to nuclear disarmament but show its true will in practice.

articles.title: Papers Denounce Park Geun Hye Group for Paving Way for Japan's Reinvasion
articles.content:
Papers Denounce Park Geun Hye Group for Paving Way for Japan's Reinvasion
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of south Korea is actively joining in military exchange and joint drills with Japan. Days ago, her group resumed the south Korean navy flotilla's port-call at Japan which had been suspended for five years.
					 It is even revealing the attempt to give "information on missiles of the north" to Japan with THAAD deployment in south Korea as an occasion while talking about "sharing information".
					
					 This is an open challenge to the will of all Koreans to settle accounts with Japan over its past crimes without fail and an unpardonable act of treachery of paving the way for reinvasion of Japan, sworn enemy of the nation, newspapers here on Sunday said in commentaries.
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is the fact that Park's group is actively joining in sharing military information with Japan under the backstage manipulation of the U.S. and hastening the building of triangular military alliance, Rodong Sinmun says, and continues:
					
					 The puppet group's frantic act will only threaten more the destiny of the nation, and the south Korean people will suffer bitterer misfortune and disasters.
					
					 All Koreans should punish the Park Geun Hye group of traitors, trouble-maker of the nation, as early as possible.
					
					 Minju Joson stresses that although Park group is making desperate efforts every sin brings punishment with it and the ruin of those resorting to pro-Japanese and pro-U.S. flunkeyism and confrontation with compatriots is a matter of time.

articles.title: There Is No Most Suitable Site for THAAD Deployment: S. Korean Organization
articles.content:
There Is No Most Suitable Site for THAAD Deployment: S. Korean Organization 
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The national action for checking THAAD deployment grouping 90 civic and public organizations of south Korea in a commentary on Aug. 19 denounced the puppet group for talking about the "examination of third site", according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News.
					 Park Geun Hye, talking about the "examination of third site " for THAAD deployment, is making wide publicity to it and the minister of Defense and its spokesman disclosed their intention to press ahead with it, the organization said, adding:
					
					 There is no most suitable site for THAAD deployment on this land and the retraction of the decision to deploy THAAD is the only answer.
					
					 It accused the regime of trying to put down no-THAAD actions, while resorting to various moves to crack down upon inhabitants.

articles.title: Wednesday Rally Held in S. Korea in Protest against Puppet Regime's Action against Victims of Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Wednesday Rally Held in S. Korea in Protest against Puppet Regime's Action against Victims of Sexual Slavery
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Members of south Korean civic organizations including the Federation of Women's Organizations, students and victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army held the 1244th Wednesday rally in Seoul on August 17, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 Victims of the sexual slavery accused the puppet authorities of covering up the past crimes of Japan and imposing sufferings upon the victims by making a humiliating "agreement" with Japan.
					
					 On December 28 last year the Park Geun Hye regime concluded the "agreement" in return for "gratuity" from Japan and this act is little short of sacrificing victims for a petty amount of money, they noted, adding:
					
					 The regime made an "agreement" with Japan though it should not do so but refused to apply for getting the data on sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army recorded at UNESCO as world heritage. The regime is turning back the wheel of history.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Denounces S. Korean Political Camp for Shunning Probe into Truth about Sewol Tragedy
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Denounces S. Korean Political Camp for Shunning Probe into Truth about Sewol Tragedy 
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People on August 19 in an editorial denounced the south Korean political camp for shunning the probe into truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 Referring to the hunger-strike by Yu Kyong Gun, executive chairman of the Consultative Council of Families of Victims of April 16 Ferry Sewol Disaster and bereaved family member, at Kwanghwamun plaza of Seoul from August 17, the editorial went on:
					
					 Hunger-strike being staged by Yu with the will to fight to the death shows gloomy politics and deplorable human rights situation.
					
					 The political camp is untrustworthy as it is irresponsible for the promise made with the people.
					
					 And the editorial held that the opposition parties are also to blame for Yuâ€™s hunger-strike, adding that if the opposition parties do not resolutely opt for probing the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster, the people will punish the whole political camp.

articles.title: Indian Paper Praises Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Korea's Liberation
articles.content:
Indian Paper Praises Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Korea's Liberation
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The Indian paper Rising Europe on August 17 carried an article titled "President Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Korea's Liberation".
					 Noting that August 15 this year was the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation from the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists, the article went on:
					
					 The Korean people impressively recall the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, who achieved the historic cause of national liberation, on the occasion of the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 The President formed the Down-with-Imperialism Union in his teens, which meant the declaration of stand off with imperialism, and founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and launched the anti-Japanese war against the Japanese imperialist aggressors, who styled themselves "leader of Asia", without rear of state and support by regular army.
					
					 He led battles with the enemies to victory with mysterious guerrilla methods and called upon patriotic forces of all strata to turn out in the sacred war for liberation of the country.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung built a new democratic country after the liberation and defeated the U.S. imperialists in the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War, thereby shattering the myth of the "mightiness" of the U.S., and established a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence on the ruins.

articles.title: Songun Leadership Exploits of Kim Jong Il Praised by Russian Internet News
articles.content:
Songun Leadership Exploits of Kim Jong Il Praised by Russian Internet News
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The exploits of leader Kim Jong Il who laid a firm foundation for prosperity of the country and the nation with his outstanding and tested leadership will shine long with the Day of Songun in the DPRK.
					 Russian internet news Yerofei-D.V. said this on August 11.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960, an event of great significance.
					
					 Since then Kim Jong Il inspected a lot of units of the KPA till the last period of his life.
					
					 Kim Jong Il protected socialism, upholding the banner of Songun, and opened up a new era of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 He put forward the KPA in the van of the sacred drive.
					
					 The DPRK is invincible thanks to its single-minded unity, remains strong thanks to self-reliance in defence and is prospering through the industrial revolution in the new century. This eye-opening reality is unthinkable without his Songun leadership exploits.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised in Czech Republic
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The Czech branch of the Korean Friendship Association posted on its internet website a special write-up on August 16 to mark the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 It carried 20 odd photos on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and an article titled "Korea's Liberation Day August 15".
					
					 August 15 is Korea's liberation day.
					
					 The great President Kim Il Sung led the anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory and liberated Korea from the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung is the founder of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 The Korean people hold in high esteem Comrade Kim Il Sung as eternal president of the DPRK as he performed great exploits for the country and the nation.
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung was born into a patriotic and revolutionary family in Mangyongdae on April 15, 1912.
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung embarked upon the road of the revolution in his teens and founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and launched fierce anti-Japanese war and achieved the historic cause of Korea's liberation on August 15, 1945.

articles.title: Korea's Liberation Day Marked in China, Nigeria
articles.content:
Korea's Liberation Day Marked in China, Nigeria 
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The opening ceremony of Korean cultural exhibition took place in Beijing, China and a film show in Enugu State, Nigeria on August 15 on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 On display at the venue of the exhibition were photos on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also on display books, photos, art pieces and handicrafts introducing the DPRK.
					
					 A Korean film introducing Yonphung Scientists Holiday Camp was shown at the film show.
					
					 Speakers at the Korean cultural exhibition ceremony expressed pleasure over holding the exhibition to mark August 15.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung embarked on the road of the revolution in his teens and defeated the Japanese imperialists by leading anti-Japanese armed struggle and achieved the liberation of Korea, they said, adding that the Chinese people would be able to know well about the DPRK rapidly developing in Mallima speed.

articles.title: Day of Songun Marked in Austria, Guinea
articles.content:
Day of Songun Marked in Austria, Guinea
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A lecture and reading session took place in Austria and Guinea on August 13 and 16 with the approach of the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The chief of the Youth Group for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Austria said in his lecture:
					
					 The Songun revolutionary line indicated by H.E. Kim Jong Il, eternal leader of the Workers' Party of Korea, serves as an almighty treasured sword in smashing the U.S.-led imperialists' moves for a war and reliably protecting sovereignty and dignity of the country and peace and security of the world.
					
					 Under the Songun revolutionary leadership of H.E. Kim Jong Il the Korean people vigorously advanced despite all sorts of obstacles and difficulties.
					
					 The Korean people will surely build a prosperous socialist power.

articles.title: Chinese Paper Reports No-THAAD Actions in S. Korea
articles.content:
Chinese Paper Reports No-THAAD Actions in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The Chinese People's Daily on August 17 carried an article titled "South Korean people protest against decision on THAAD deployment through head-shaving, it may go to extreme phase".
					 The article referred in detail to the strong protest actions waged by inhabitants in Songju County, North Kyongsang Province of south Korea against THAAD deployment moves of the puppet authorities.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 An inhabitant in Songju County expressed the will to do more extreme thing than head-shaving if it is possible to prevent THAAD deployment.
					
					 Songju County residents say that their peaceable life is disturbed by the decision on THAAD deployment.
					
					 If THAAD is deployed in Songju County, it will mean south Korea admitting itself to be a military colony of the U.S., they said, calling upon south Korean people to get united firmly and vigorously launch protest actions against THAAD deployment.
					
					 The "government" said it would reconsider THAAD deployment in other area in Songju County, but the inhabitants said that the decision on THAAD deployment itself was wrong and THAAD should not be deployed in south Korea.
					
					 If Songju County decisively rejects THAAD deployment, no THAAD can be deployed in south Korea, they stressed.

articles.title: Tablet to Honor Kim Jong Il Unveiled at Ignat Trade Center of Russia
articles.content:
Tablet to Honor Kim Jong Il Unveiled at Ignat Trade Center of Russia
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A tablet to honor leader Kim Jong Il was unveiled with due ceremony at the Ignat Trade Center in Vladivostok on August 18 on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of his visit to the Far Eastern Region of the Russian Federation and the fifth anniversary of his visit to the Siberian and Far Eastern Region.
					 Present at the ceremony were the vice general manager and other personages of the Ignat Trade Center, masses and officials of the DPRK Mission in Vladivostok.
					
					 The tablet was unveiled by the financial manager of the center and the consul general of the DPRK.

articles.title: Delegacion de PTC participa en VII Congreso de MPLA
articles.content:
Delegacion de PTC participa en VII Congreso de MPLA
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar del 17 al 20 en Luanda de Angola el VII Congreso del Movimiento Popular de Liberacion de Angola. 
					La delegacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, encabezada por Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC, participo en ese conclave. 
					
					Tomaron asientos de la tribuna Jose Eduardo Dos Santos, presidente de la Republica de Angola y del Comite Central del MPLA, los miembros de la direccion de ese movimiento, Ri Su Yong, jefe de la delegacion del PTC, y otros titulares de las delegaciones de partidos de varios paises. 
					
					En la ocasion, hubo el informe sobre las labores y las intervenciones de felicitacion.
					
					Ri Su Yong, jefe de la delegacion del PTC, pronuncio las palabras de felicitacion. 
					
					Por encargo del CC del PTC felicito calurosamente el VII Congreso del MPLA y dijo que el conclave deviene un importante motivo para preparar nuevo jalon en convertir Angola en el pais independiente y prospero. 
					
					Subrayo que en acato a los propositos del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, el PTC hara en el futuro tambien todos sus esfuerzos por ampliar y desarrollar mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con el MPLA. 
					
					En el congreso, Jose Eduardo Dos Santos fue reelegido como presidente del CC del MPLA.
					
					Durante el conclave, Ri se reunio con Jose Eduardo Dos Santos, presidente de la Republica de Angola y del CC del MPLA.
					
					Jose Eduardo Dos Santos expreso el sincero agradecimiento al estimado Mariscal Kim Jong Un por haber enviado la delegacion del PTC al VII Congreso del MPLA. 
					
					Ademas, el visitante coreano departio por separado con Nangolo Mbumba, secretario general de la Organizacion Popular de Africa Sudoccidental de Namibia, Eliseu Joaquim Machava, secretario general del Partido Frente de Liberacion Nacional de Mozambique, el presidente del Movimiento de Liberacion de Sao Tome y Principe-Partido Social Democratico, el secretario internacional del CC del Partido Comunista de Cuba, Jose Ramon Balaguer, y otros jefes de las delegaciones del partido de varios paises.

articles.title: Vocero del CRPP condena el simulacro Ulji Freedom Guardian"
articles.content:
Vocero del CRPP condena el simulacro Ulji Freedom Guardian"
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Vocero del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 21 una declaracion condenando a EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos que tratan de perpetrar desde el dia 22 el simulacro militar conjunto de gran envergadura "Ulji Freedom Guardian".
					No hay necesidad de hablar de que este simulacro es la maniobra provocativa de guerra nuclear de agresion para violar y estrangular la dignidad y la soberania de la RPDC y el derecho a la existencia del pueblo coreano.
					
					Senala el vocero y continua:
					
					Lo que no podemos pasar por alto es que esta locura belica que se perpetra bajo la disposicion de dar el golpe inesperado contra la RPDC deviene el mas abierto obstaculo fisico y acto desafiante para echar agua fria al fervor de todos los coreanos por la reunificacion, que fue aumentado gracias a nuestra propuesta de efectuar el gran acto pannacional de reunificacion encaminado a mejorar las relaciones Norte-Sur y lograr cuanto antes la reintegracion nacional, y para detener la corriente de la independencia antiyanqui que se recrudece mas junto con la lucha contra la ubicacion de THAAD.
					
					Tanto ayer como hoy es invariable la posicion nuestra relativa a la situacion creada.
					
					Destruiremos despiadadamente toda clase de hostilidades, agresiones y provocaciones con nuestro disuasivo nuclear consolidado firmemente con el unico poderio de la unidad monolitica del ejercito y pueblo y la bandera del desarrollo paralelo.
					
					La unica opcion de EE.UU. para mantener su honor y existencia reside en abandonar las peligrosas provocaciones de guerra de agresion a la RPDC y su absurda y bandidesca politica hostil a esta para lograr algo mediante la sancion y presion.
					
					  Aprovechamos esta ocasion para volver a dar advertencia seria a Park Geun-hye y su banda de traidores.
					
					Estas deben actuar con prudencia viendo correctamente el poderio politico y militar de la RPDC que avanza mas con el paso de los dias y su posicion cambiada fundamentalmente, asi como la estructura estrategica de la Peninsula Coreana que se transforma por ello.

articles.title: Una entidad coreana condena la artimana de las autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
Una entidad coreana condena la artimana de las autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ACNC) -- Park Geun-hye y su banda de traidores, que pese a la fuete condena y demanda de devolucion del interior y exterior del pais estaban encarcelando en mas de 4 meses a las ciudadanas norcoreanas que secuestraron en colectivo, publicaron recientemente que "arraigaron a ellas en la sociedad".
					Coincidiendo con esto, las autoridades y las fuerzas conservadoras ultraderechistas del Sur de Corea hablan ruidosamente que "ya el Norte no tiene fundamento de criticar la detencion forzosa de las chicas norcoreanas".
					
					El vocero de la Comision de Medidas Emergentes por la Salvacion de las Victimas del Secuestro Forzoso hizo publica el dia 21 una declaracion en que condeno tales actos de las autoridades surcoreanos como una vil artimana para encubrir para siempre los verdaderos aspectos de sus imperdonables crimenes de secuestro y evitar la censura social sobre la detencion forzosa de las norcoreanas y la presion de las opiniones publicas internas y externas en demanda del encuentro de las chicas con sus familiares y la devolucion.
					
					Aunque la banda surcoreana dice que "las norcoreanas salidas a la sociedad tienen la posicion social de las personas libres", no da a la publicidad a ellas e impide todo tipo de contacto con la prensa bajo el pretexto de la "proteccion personal", lo cual demuestra fehacientemente que el anuncio de los titeres surcoreanos es la mentira completamente inventada. 
					
					Los traidores surcoreanos no permiten a esas chicas la expresion libre de su voluntad. Esto no es para la "seguridad personal", sino para evitar la revelacion clara de sus actos de secuestro colectivo y sus crimenes antieticos sin precedentes en la historia.
					
					Al no poder doblegar con las conciliaciones y amenazas de toda indole la decision y voluntad de las muchachas de regresar a la RPDC, la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye trata de aislarlas para siempre en un lugar apartado.
					
					Al tomar en cuenta la brutalidad y crueldad de las autoridades surcoreanas, podrian ser asesinadas despiadadamente unas de las chicas norcoreanas.
					
					No permitiremos ni en lo minimo los crimenes de secuestro colectivo y los actos antieticos de los titeres surcoreanos, sino lucharemos hasta el fin para salvar nuestras ciudadanas y traerlas al regazo de la patria.
